title: Chicken, chorizo and butter bean stew

ingredients.item: 2 x 400g cans essential butter beans, drained and rinsed
handful flat leaf parsley, leaves roughly chopped

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a casserole dish or large saucepan over a medium heat then brown the chicken thighs for 2-3 minutes on each side. Lift the chicken out onto a plate; set aside. Add the soffritto to the pan with a pinch of salt and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until softened. Stir in the chorizo, garlic and smoked paprika; cook for 2 minutes.

Add the stock, tomatoes and beans, bring to the boil then reduce to a simmer. Return the chicken to the pan and cook for 25 minutes or until cooked through. Lift out the chicken onto a board and, once cool enough, shred the meat, discarding the skin and bones. Return the shredded chicken to the pan. Season and scatter over the parsley. Serve with crusty bread.
